doc.title: Gamecaster's Battlefield 2142 Invitational
doc.plot: This original eight-part half-hour tournament series follows the frenzied combat between eight teams invited to compete in EA's critically acclaimed Battlefield 2142 for the PC. The best teams in the world fought it out for the not -too -shabby $30,000 purse! The featured the use of the Gamecaster Cybercam S2, a patent-pending camera technology that creates a 360Â° view of the "world" inside a game. This remarkable advance allows a professional sports cameraman to shoot a video game tournament with the precision and fluidity of a real-life pro sports events.
